channel.title: Please help me :(
channel.description:
hi
when i use ice barrage on a npc it works..
but when i use it on a player.. it just hit 0.. and not even a gfx.. u dont even see the barrage.. just a 0... but on npc's.. you see the gfx and everything
how do i fix this?

item.title: Please help me :(
item.dc:creator: @guku116 guku116
item.description:
@guku116 wrote:

i’m using linkscape v1 like when i use barrage it sends a telle request… i deleted the telle request but now the barrage gfx or anything doest show up…

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me :(
item.dc:creator: @MonkeyMad MonkeyMad
item.description:
@MonkeyMad wrote:

somethings wrong with the code… search this if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) u shuld see this if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(39); startAnimation(1979); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.barrage(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = -1; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

replace that with if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(39); startAnimation(1979); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.barrage(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = -1; //stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 94) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } } gl;D

Read full topic
